refnamediv.refpurpose: Retrieve the error number set by the last posix function that failed

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.examples;
posix_get_last_error example
This example attempt to kill a bogus process id, which will set the last error. We will then print out the last errno.
<?php posix_kill(999459,SIGKILL); echo 'Your error returned was '.posix_get_last_error(); //Your error was ___ ?>
